Description: Blue glazed composition shabti of sš Ḥry with black painted detail: a lappet-wig, an unmodelled face with traced eyes, a collar and joined hands with bracelets holding two hoes; the front of the leg section is inscribed with a column of black painted Hieroglyphs; the back is decorated with a representation of a seed-basket and a yoke with two pendular nw-pots.
